Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6780 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-6780 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.38-6, affected by CVE-2023-6780
